LanguageData.CNAdvancedNetworkedArm.label: Advanced Networked Arm
LanguageData.CNAdvancedNetworkedArm.description: An advanced networked prosthetic that offloads processing to remote processors. Cheaper than self contained bionic arms, and it's significantly more efficient. The cost comes from the infrastructure required for it to function.
LanguageData.CNAdvancedNetworkedHand.label: Advanced Networked Hand
LanguageData.CNAdvancedNetworkedHand.description: An advanced networked prosthetic that offloads processing to remote processors. Cheaper than self contained bionic Hands, and it's significantly more efficient. The cost comes from the infrastructure required for it to function.
LanguageData.CNAdvancedNetworkedLeg.label: Advanced Networked Leg
LanguageData.CNAdvancedNetworkedLeg.description: An advanced networked prosthetic that offloads processing to remote processors. Cheaper than self contained bionic legs, and it's significantly more efficient. The cost comes from the infrastructure required for it to function.
